initialize((address,uint256,bool,address.details: MUST be called during the contract upgrade to set up the proxies state.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

isStakingAllowlist().notice: The staking allowlist flag which, when enabled, allows staking only for addresses in allowlist.

minStakeAmount().notice: The minimum staking amount for each node.

pendingRewards(address).notice: The accrued rewards for each node.

stake(uint256).notice: Interface for nodes to stake their BRR with the protocol. Note: when allowlist is enabled, only nodes with the allowlist can stake.

unstake(uint256).notice: Interface for users to unstake their BRR from the protocol.

updateRewards(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Function for the reward manager to add rewards to a node's pending rewards balance.

documentation.text: @notice The staking allowlist flag which, when enabled, allows staking only for addresses in allowlist.
@notice The minimum staking amount for each node.
@notice The accrued rewards for each node.

@notice Initializes the contract.
 @dev MUST be called during the contract upgrade to set up the proxies state.

@notice Interface for nodes to stake their BRR with the protocol. Note: when allowlist is enabled, only nodes
 with the allowlist can stake.
@notice Interface for users to unstake their BRR from the protocol.
@notice Function for the reward manager to add rewards to a node's pending rewards balance.
